IP = 	   192.168.68.33
Subnet = 255.255.255.0

IP = 	   11000000.10101000.01000100.00100001
Subnet = 11111111.11111111.11111111.00000000
	AND
Network= 11000000.10101000.01000100.00000000
Address

Network Address = 192.168.68.0

Reverse Subnet = 00000000.00000000.00000000.11111111
IP		   = 11000000.10101000.01000100.00100001
		   OR
Broadcast	   = 11000000.10101000.01000100.11111111
Address

Broadcast Address = 192.168.68.255

Range of IP = {192.168.68.1 ------ 192.168.68.254}

Number of Systems = 2^n - 2
			= 2^8 - 2
			= 254
